xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 05 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 01:55 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 02:49 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 10:09 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 10:31 <phenotips_org> has joined #medsavant 10:44 <sdumitriu> Hi mcupak 10:44 <mcupak> sdumitriu: hi 10:45 <sdumitriu> Do you know Maven? 10:46 <mcupak> yeah, I've been using it for years 10:47 <sdumitriu> OK, good 10:51 <sdumitriu> You should start committing some small stuff 10:51 <sdumitriu> Can you take care of https://github.com/compbio-UofT/medsavant/issues/14 ? 10:54 <mcupak> sure 14:00 <phenotips_org> has joined #medsavant 14:05 <mfiume> has joined #medsavant 14:05 <mfiume> here now 14:08 <bvancea> hello marc 14:08 <mfiume> hey is that bogdan 14:08 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:09 <bvancea> yes, I am bogdan 14:09 <sdumitriu1> bvancea: You didn't do the daily scrum lately... 14:09 <sdumitriu1> What are you working on? 14:09 <mfiume> hey bogdan! would you like to join the Google Hangout too? It's mostly just going to be an intro for Miro 14:09 <bvancea> oh, sorry about that sdumitriu 14:10 <bvancea> yes, I will, let me do the scrum now 14:10 <bvancea> I've indexed a couple of variants on solr using the parser I have implmented 14:10 <bvancea> and I've compared it with what variants I have imported in medsavant 14:10 <bvancea> with the UI 14:11 <bvancea> there's a lot more variants, apparently due to the DNA id 14:11 <bvancea> now I want to use the parser in medsavant to extract the variants 14:11 <bvancea> and index those 14:12 <mfiume> miro, you around? 14:13 <sdumitriu1> Misko's here, joining in a few minutes once he gets online 14:14 <sdumitriu1> bvancea: OK, sounds good 14:14 <sdumitriu1> Any trouble so far? 14:14 <bvancea> not really 14:14 <mcupak> mfiume: hey, yeah, ready when you are 14:15 <bvancea> I find it hard to start with the TDD approach 14:15 <bvancea> not really sure what tests to make before coding ;)) 14:15 <sdumitriu1> mfiume: Where's the hangout? 14:15 <bvancea> I would like to join the hangout aswell 14:15 <bvancea> :) 14:16 <mfiume> ive added everyone 14:16 <mfiume> via your gmail accounts 14:16 <sdumitriu1> mfiume: I think you got the wrong Bogdan 14:16 <mfiume> let me know if you dont get them 14:16 <bvancea> my account is 14:16 <mfiume> maybe, bogdan what's your gmail 14:16 <bvancea> bogdan.aurel.vancea@gmail.com 14:17 <sdumitriu1> mfiume: Didn't get 14:19 <bvancea> I didn't get any invite 14:20 <sdumitriu1> bvancea: Are you on GPlus? 14:20 <mfiume> bogdan i just invited you 14:20 <mfiume> you get it? 14:35 <bvancea> I've just realized 14:35 <bvancea> its so dark in my room -_- 15:59 <bvancea> sdumitriu1, if I don't have any issue on github I'm working on, how should I set the message for the commits? 15:59 <sdumitriu1> Make an issue 15:59 <sdumitriu1> What exactly are you committing? 16:00 <bvancea> the service that I use for Indexing 16:01 <bvancea> its not integrated with medsavant, I just used the parser medsavant provides 16:04 <bvancea> is it ok if I create an issue call "Add solr indexing" or something in those lines? 16:04 <bvancea> or is that too generic 16:05 <sdumitriu1> That is good for a meta-issue 16:05 <sdumitriu1> But you should have more specific sub-issues 16:07 <bvancea> how about, "Add Solr indexing support for variants" 16:09 <sdumitriu1> OK 16:16 <bvancea> thus far I've worked with an external solr server 16:16 <bvancea> should I add a solr server to the distribution, like its done with phenotips 16:16 <bvancea> ? 16:22 <sdumitriu1> No 16:22 <sdumitriu1> Keep it external 16:23 <bvancea> okay 16:36 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant
